pnp:RoleDefinition.Name: View Only
pnp:RoleDefinition.Description: Can view pages, list items, and documents. Document types with server-side file handlers can be viewed in the browser but not downloaded.

pnp:RoleDefinition.Name: Records Center Web Service Submitters
pnp:RoleDefinition.Description: Submit content to this site using Web Services.

Department: HSE & Business Services 
Circular No: VB/CIR/13/2020 
Published Date: 29.03.2020  ​​​​​​​

To: All QP Staff 

​​​​​​​Select 'Edit' to start working with this basic two-column template with an emphasis on text and examples of text formatting. With your page in edit mode, select this paragraph and replace it with your own text. Then, select the Basic two-column template title and replace it, too. Type your name in the page author field under the title.

You've just edited a page template and you're on your way to making this page your own!

(Signed)
NABEEL MOHAMMED AL-BUENAIN
VP, HSE & BUSINESS SERVICES ​​​​​​​

Department: Gas Field Development  
Staff Movements No: UG/020/20  
Published Date: 05.04.2020 ​​​​​​​

To: All Directors / Department Managers 

Further to our previous circular no. UG/013/20 dated 27/02/2020, please note that Dr. Naji Saad, Assistant Manager, Reservoir Development, UGD, will be away from 05-04-2020 till 30-04-2020 (both days inclusive).

During this period Mr. Boy Wibowo Pangarso, Head of Geosciences, UGD/2 will act as Assistant Manager, Reservoir Development, A/UGD, in addition to his normal duties.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
(Signed)
AYED RASHID AL-MUDAHKA 
MANAGER, GAS FIELD DEVELOPMENT

How do you get started?

Select 'Edit' to start working with this basic two-column template with an emphasis on text and examples of text formatting. With your page in edit mode, select this paragraph and replace it with your own text. Then, select the Basic two-column template title and replace it, too. Type your name in the page author field under the title.

You've just edited a page template and you're on your way to making this page your own!

The area of the page just above the editing area provides commands like 'Save', 'Discard changes' and 'Page details'. It also provides messages like 'Draft not saved' and 'Your page has been saved'.

As you've made edits to the page, have you noticed the message near the Save button change? Even when you don't select Save, drafts of the page are being saved automatically! This background save makes it less likely you will lose the changes you make.

Now that you've mastered the basics, you can also read more about editing page details in SharePoint. Your pages have never looked better.
